alert.note: Alert for Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Piscataquis and Somerset Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Billy-Jack Depot to near Baker Lake to 7 miles north of Telos Lake. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Billy-Jack Depot, Caucomgomoc Lake, Baker Lake, Chamberlain Lake, Tamway, Telos Lake, Chesuncook and Baxter State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
